name: Robot Rampage (itch) (CrypticSilver)
description:
GMTK Game Jam 2018 - Welcome to Robot Rampage, a top down shooter where not only do your bullets NOT harm the enemy robots, but ammo is collected only by being shot.  

You must use the environmental hazards (Red Barrels) to take out the enemies.

Objective:

Clear the map of all enemy robots.

Device Support:

PC Only

WARNING! The game window might be too large depending on your screen size. To fix the issue hold down the Windows Key and press the UP Arrow Key to enter int o full screen mode.

Free Assets:

https://kenney.nl/assets/ui-pack-space-expansion

https://kenney.nl/assets/kenney-fonts

https://freesound.org/search/?q=robot
